website_summaries.verdict: Although it can be confusing to install, this model is worth considering if you need a hand-held sprayer that's built for versatile use.
pros: This sprayer faucet has streamlined design and can be wall-mounted
Can also be used to clean tub, sink, toilet, and cloth diapers
cons: May require additional fittings to prevent leaks

customer_reviews.title: The adapter you need.
customer_reviews.text: If you are installing this item in the US with NPT piping here is the adapter and seals you need: G Thread (BSP) to NPT (US Thread) Pipe Fitting Adapter with G Thread Bonded Washer Seal Included (1/2" MG x 1/2"FNPT (2 Pieces))
customer_reviews.author: Norman Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It’s fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I love it! It was a pain to install for my husband as we had to cut out drywall and make those repairs after but it was well worth it . We checked for leaks and just had to make one minor adjustment . This is not for an unseasoned plumber to install or a do it yourself person. You do need expensive plumbing tools to install which we already had on hand. Would be very easy to install on a new build by a seasoned plumber . It works great and is worth every penny . I love the quality and how it’s flush to the wall. Very easy to use and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed At The End
customer_reviews.text: DISAPPOINTED AT THE END Got this bidet shower installed in chrome finish, loved it when the bathroom was ready. BUT everything changed in one week, when the shower sprayer push button got free and i had to shut down the main valve as a result. For now its just there with no purpose. The product looks good but the sprayer isn't. I will try to get a replacement, lets see, will update you all.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Better than
customer_reviews.text: I work on a lot of new walk in showers. This works great on new work and installing was a breeze.. Hot & cold water with a lever an push button sprayer.. It doe's spray hard if turned on high, but can be controlled by the lever. Watch the depth for the cover plate need to add 1/2 for cement board then thickness of the tile, that will leave about 2 inch finish plus cover plate. I used to install two controllers one for shower head an one for hand held. Cost difference about $200 saved. This is the best why to go. Bush chrome looks great and works perfectly... will by again.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent hand held sprayer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hand held sprayer for the price. Two reasons why I didnt give it 5 stars: After installation there was a leak in the plumbing. The installer blamed a solder joint in the fixture, but not sure if it was the installer's fault or the manufacturer. It was easily repaired. Second, the sprayer is actually turned on and off by a push-button after you open the valve on the wall. This is a little different from typical sprayers and takes a little getting used to. It has a beautiful finish and is solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: N. J.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Mud Room/Dog Washing Station
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the middle of a home reno project and I had a hard time finding a faucet that was wall mounted with only a sprayer and not a spout as well. Plus one that offered hot and cold water. This one fits the bill and it works great. The color is true to the pictures if you are looking for a brushed gold look. The quality is nice and the faucet looks great for my intended needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. All metal construction. Looks beautiful. I'm remodeling our master bath and after a trip to Bali, my GF wanted a bidet hose. Most of the reasonably priced units are cold water, this one you can adjust hot/cold and doesn't cost all that much more. I'm mounting on the side of the cabinet next to the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: mmmm

customer_reviews.title: Too much work!!!!!! We’re thinking about return it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it Came with all the hardware it needs. It took us easily 2 hrs at home depot to figure out which size of adopter and pipe to use. Then finally the Home Depot guy told me they do not carry anything/hardware that can install this. By the end we figured something out and spent extra $70 just on the hardwares. That’s a lot of work!!!
customer_reviews.author: NT@PASADENA

customer_reviews.title: Fashion and function
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and a great addition to your toilet routine, especially if your sink is far. Another plus is that you are able to control the temperature and pressure like a normal bathroom faucet if connected to both hot and cold water supply.
customer_reviews.author: Abu

customer_reviews.title: Click button sprayer is great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a bathroom remodel. Easy install. Love the click on and off feature in the sprayer head and the warm water is worth the effort vs a non mixing valve bidet. Looks and performs great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I’m obsessed. Being a woman, sometimes you get that not so fresh feeling. I get it on a regular basis and who wants to shower 5 times a day?! Also nice for before after sexytime. It’s sturdy and well-made. I should have gotten this years ago. GET THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kloan

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: We like this product, has been using for couple of months now. A bidet sprayer with cold and hot mix valve, helpful during non-summer days as well. The regular ones out there can be used only during summer time. One thing I would recommend during installation is that make sure you ask the plumber to add two separate valves, one for cold and another one for hot pipe. This way in case if you encounter any leakage later you could simply turn off the line. We also strongly recommend to turn of the sprayer when not in use. The controller at the tip of the hose is not meant to contain the waterline pressure.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Fittings came loose during installation. Ruined part of my cabinet since the leek didn't start until after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Leo B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Husband installed this very easily. It looks great and is easy to use. Doesn't leak and supports hot/cold water. Can adjust pressure and spray as well. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: All's good except...
customer_reviews.text: The on/off button on the shower head got stuck after 3 months of use...!! Wonder if a replacement part is available
customer_reviews.author: Aliasghar Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Faucet.. we installed it near the tub and use it for washing hair.. which is different than I think it’s intended use but works perfectly and were really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended ! The price is so cheap compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Shumkova

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the p parts
customer_reviews.text: Install was not super easy but figurable. Looks high end though and works well. Button a little sticky at first but now works great. Actually using in RV for showering
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: dies after 3 months light use
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed i paid so much only to see the handheld button stopped working n get stuck never to release. Now i jave to rip the whole thing from wall..just cuz of internal plastic cheapo stuff...trustmi send me replacement i aint ordering a full priced set
customer_reviews.author: iBuy

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer head leaks after 6 months of regular use.
customer_reviews.text: We installed when we did major renos. After 6 months of use, the sprayer head started leaking right at the spray location (not a leak in the hose or connection). When you first open it, regardless of how little you open the main valve, you get a burst of water which can make a mess. To avoid that you have to first hold the trigger open, then open the main valve.
customer_reviews.author: Ehsan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: We use this faucet daily, and we never turn it off. When you want to use it, you can just push the button and expect a soft stream of warm water.
customer_reviews.author: B Wells

customer_reviews.title: Item is shinning but hand spray started leaking water
customer_reviews.text: Item is shinning but hand spray started leaking water few weeks of installation. This created a big mess on my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Yasir Shahid

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews on installation. Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nightmare to install as had to change old valves on all of the lines. Used a plumber. No problem so far...
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: So this does not fit US pipe thread. Need the adapter stated in above review. Also the factory joints leaked, bad, I had to re solder the joints, I guess other than that I like it, Pretty cool thing
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy install great product definitely a great addition to the bathroom. I bought the nuts and screw separately from Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Small well built. Used this to replace the shower fixture in my RV. Easy to install, nice very flexible hose even in cold weather. Nice finish. Home Run !
customer_reviews.author: william r.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Adjustable water temperature, easy to use. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: composer_dzh

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have it and it is great! I saw this all over Europe and Asia and I liked, so I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia

customer_reviews.title: Great hot and cold bidet
customer_reviews.text: Great product with integrated hot and cold. I used 3 x 2 1/2" screws and nuts to anchor it as someone else suggested. It makes a really clean install on the inside of the cabinet. I also bought 2 x Straight Adapter, 1/2 BSPP Male x 1/2 NPT Male as the fitting are British not US threads. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: S&A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you’r Persian and you’r here looking for some Shelang Lol you should get these 😂🤘🏻
customer_reviews.author: PaRi$

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer handle stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for 4 months and the button on the sprayer stopped working correctly, the button clicks but no water comes out. They replied to another review saying to contact them to replace it, but did not leave any contact info, and there is none available on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Woodberry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It does not have mixing Valve so it has to be off to get hot water in sink and shower. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shenaz

customer_reviews.title: No spec showing British Threads for water lines
customer_reviews.text: Product has British Threads ( no taper) to connect water lines. Took several days to locate fittings to convert to MPT
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: We are purchasing this for a home that is currently being worked on, so it is basically bare walls, and have no dry walls, it has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It’s our 2nd hand sprayer and it broke again.... Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about the product but for the temperature control, you only have a little to work with. Also for some reason there is chipping on the handle bar. Besides that, it's a great spray bidet .
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 2 of these item. Both had issues and started leaking. 1st one was leaking from the sprayer and 2nd from the lever. Both of them were in use for less thann30days after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unique
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for sprayer with hot and cold connection. It’s easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Atm R Karim

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: solid and well built. However the sprayer locks at times which prevents the water from coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Samir- karen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice warm water wash leaves you fresh as a daisy!!
customer_reviews.author: spleen

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and design 1A
customer_reviews.text: Im’ plumber I installed it in my bathroom very happy with the hand bidet really good
customer_reviews.author: ramon villalba

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Looks great and I like button on/off feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ivoraf

customer_reviews.title: Great water pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and has great water pressure. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Teflon tape a must
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you use a lot id teflon tape lol. It will leak on the connections
customer_reviews.author: AmanteNJ

customer_reviews.title: Good bidget but bad spray head
customer_reviews.text: This is good bidget, easy to install and use but spray head couldn’t last a year. I had to buy another sprayer head.
customer_reviews.author: FA

product_meta.title: TRUSTMI Toilet Concealed Hot and Cold Bidet Spray Set,Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:Brushed NickelTRUSTMI Hot and Cold Mixing Toilet Bidet Sprayer
Material:Brass Body, Stainless Steel Sprayer Head
Color:Brushed Nickel
Function:2 Function Bidet Sprayer Head
Number of Handle:1
Decorate Plate: 5.27 inch * 2.75 inch
Connector: G 1/2 inch
Hose:47 inch Long, Stainless Steel and PVC+NYLON Inner
Mounting Type:In Wall Mounted

Packing Include:
1 * Complete Bidet Sprayer
1 * Mounting Screw Bag
1 * Specification
feature_bullets: Toilet In Wall Mount Hot and Cold Bidet Sprayer Set, Brushed Nickel
Premium 304 Stainless Steel Brushed Nickel Hand Held Bidet Sprayer Head, Rear Push Down Pop Up Temporary Switch. 2 Function Flow (Soft and Jet), Switch by Turning Bidet Sprayer Head Nozzle
Standard G 1/2" Connector Brass Concealed Hot&Cold Rough-in Mixer Valve with Holder Combination
47 inch Stainless Steel Hose with EPDM+NYLON Inner, Can bear 170-250psi Water Pressure
Handheld Sprayer Complete Set Use as Bidet Attachment, Also as Cloth Diaper Sprayer, Cleaning, Rinsing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
